div.p: ( A) Isotopologue excess values and distribution of isotopomers of cineole for selected samples in 13CO 2 feeding experiments. All experiments are sort according to their chase time in ascending order. pu. (h): pulse time in hours. ch. (h): chase time in hours. STD: pure cineole sample. ( B) Isotopologue excess values and distribution of isotopomers of camphor for selected samples in 13CO 2 feeding experiments. All experiments are sort according to their chase time in ascending order. pu. (h): pulse time in hours. ch. (h): chase time in hours. STD: pure camphor sample.
